short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seamlessly integrates a CSS panel into your Webflow projects

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
** No more embeds **
Eliminates the need for embed elements and writing CSS inside the <head> of your projects

** CSS Variables FTW **
Use Webflow's own CSS variables in custom CSS.

** Work smarter **
Zest for Webflow recognises your Webflow CSS classes, tags and colour variables as you begin to type them

** Write:advanced (CSS) **
Enables more advanced and !important CSS not currently offered by Webflow's style panel

** Work faster **
Write CSS in real-time directly within Webflow projects; no need to go back and forth to site settings

Please note: A getzest.io subscription is required to use this extension.
